entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of rain or snow this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
